org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt

Class PruningFairSets

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.PruningFairSets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>

    public class PruningFairSets
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>
    A PruningFairSets object can simplify an NGBW by pruning fair sets proposed in [Somenzi and Bloom. Efficient Buchi Automata From LTL Formulae]. Note that this object can only be used once.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
